RelatedSentence: WOLFEBORO , N.H. , May 19 ( UPI ) -- The police commissioner in the upscale summer resort of Wolfeboro , N.H. , caught referring to President Obama with a racial slur resigned Monday .
Bob Copeland quit a few days after more than 100 residents gathered for a community meeting , most of them calling for his resignation .
Copeland , 82 , who had served one full term on the police commission , was re-elected in March .
